title.rendered: Cooking Class in Jaipur And Cooking Class in Agra

content.rendered:
Cooking Class in Jaipur And Cooking Class in Agra

Cooking Class in Jaipur

Cooking Class in Jaipur

Here are the things you can expect in the cooking class –

In the class, you will be welcomed by a drink offered by the family, which varies according to the season and can include tea, chai, lassi, lemonade, sharbat, or any other beverage.

Starters: Learn how to make these dishes by hand. Starters are a big deal in India and can be considered a mini meal that you can make at home and enjoy.

Main Course: Rajasthani cuisine is known for its spicy, hearty, and incredibly filling main courses.

Cooking Class in Agra

Cooking Class in Agra

Our star chef ensures that your meal is cooked to perfection, allowing you to enjoy it in peace and without having to work up a sweat.

You will learn about Indian cuisine in our cooking classes, with a focus on the cuisine of Agra and Jaipur.

You will receive a customised learning experience whether you are travelling alone, as a couple, with family and friends, or in a group.

See More

excerpt.rendered:
For several centuries, India has been known for its food, flavors and, so what could be better than sampling some of the country native cuisine alongside a culinary expert?

Continue reading ➞ Cooking Class in Jaipur And Cooking Class in Agra
